= Installation =

Currently source code and Windows binary packages are available from this site. This package is also submitted upstream in Debian ([http://packages.debian.org/search?keywords=rifiuti2 Debian package]) and Ubuntu ([http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=rifiuti2 Ubuntu package]). For other kinds of Unix and Linux distributions, please refer to `README` file on how to compile and install.

== Windows packages ==

Since 0.5.1, Windows binaries are always distributed along with all necessary libraries. The libraries are copied from newest version of [http://gladewin32.sourceforge.net/ Glade for Windows project]. No installation is necessary; just extract the archive into any folder and it should work. However, note that this is a command line application.
